subject: p17340686
History: Shortness of breath. Evaluate for edema, effusion, pneumonia.
Findings: Right hemodialysis catheter again terminates in the right atrium. There is minimal increase in bilateral airspace opacities suggesting pulmonary edema. Moderate cardiomegaly is unchanged. The pulmonary artery is enlarged. The aortic arch is calcified. Previous rounded opacity at the right base is re-demonstrated. There is no large pleural effusion or pneumothorax.
Impression: Moderate cardiomegaly and mild-to-moderate interstitial pulmonary edema. Round lesion at the right lung base is unchanged.
